Name: Uncontrollable
Description: These troops can not be controlled. They will move, fight, and flee according to their own will.

Name: Unbreakable
Description: These troops' morale can not be broken. They will fight to the last if their commander wills it.

Name: No Attack
Description: These troops are unable to perform any attack.

Name: No Skill
Description: These troops are unable to perform any skill.

Name: No Spell
Description: These troops are unable to perform any spell.

Name: Weather Immunity
Description: These troops are resilient against every kind of weather in existence. Rain will not make them wet, and fog will not hinder their vision.

Name: Temperature Immunity
Description: These troops are unsusceptible to temperature change. Neither cold nor heat can affect them in any way.

Name: Status Immunity
Description: These troops are immune to all status effects, both positive and negative.

Name: Immortal
Description: These troops are nigh impossible to kill by any ordinary means.

Name: Gunpowder based Weapon
Description: These troops are equipped with a gunpowder-based weapon such as a musket. Rain weather will make their weapon at minimal effectiveness, and their shooting will produce a cloud of smoke that can block their vision.
